languages.text: "Нет!" {n}Горестно вскрикнув, Иеронимус бешеным взглядом обводит зал.{/n} "Пусть Инцендия и не была священным и чистейшим из орудий Императора, но кто останется здесь после нее... Он?! Она?!" {n}Иеронимус тычет пальцем во Владайма, в Риззу, а затем и в вас.{/n} "Ты?! Ты защитишь закон и веру?!"

"No!" {n}Hieronymus cries out in woe and looks around the room with ferocious eyes.{/n} "Incendia may not have been the holiest and purest of the Emperor's tools, but who will be left here when she is gone? Him? Her?" {n}Hieronymus points his finger at Vladaym, then Ryzza, and finally, you.{/n} "You? Are you going to protect the law and the faith?"
languages.original_text: "Нет!" {n}Горестно вскрикнув, Иеронимус бешеным взглядом обводит зал.{/n} "Пусть Инцендия и не была священным и чистейшим из орудий Императора, но кто останется здесь после нее... Он?! Она?!" {n}Иеронимус тычет пальцем во Владайма, в Риззу, а затем и в вас.{/n} "Ты?! Ты защитишь закон и веру?!"

languages.text: “不！”{n}希罗尼穆斯悲鸣着，环顾房间，目光凶狠。{/n}“或许因森蒂娅确实不是帝皇手中最神圣、最纯洁的工具，可若是没有了她，这里还剩下谁？他吗？她吗？”{n}希罗尼穆斯用手指着弗拉迪姆，随后指着莱萨，最后指向了你。{/n}“还是你？你愿意守护法律与信仰吗？”
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Hieronymus cries out in woe and looks around the room with ferocious eyes.{/n} "Incendia may not have been the holiest and purest of the Emperor's tools, but who will be left here when she is gone? Him? Her?" {n}Hieronymus points his finger at Vladaym, then Ryzza, and finally, you.{/n} "You? Are you going to protect the law and the faith?"

traits.locale_text: “不！”{n}希罗尼穆斯悲鸣着，用凶狠的眼光环视着大厅。{/n}“或许因森蒂娅确实不是帝皇手中最神圣、最纯洁的工具，可她死了之后，这里还剩下谁？他吗？她吗？”{n}希罗尼穆斯用手指着弗拉迪姆，随后指着莱萨，最后指向了你。{/n}“还是你？你愿意守护法律与信仰吗？”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「駄目だ！」{n}ヒエロニムスは哀れに泣き叫び、獰猛な目で部屋を見回した。{/n}「インセンディアは決して、神聖で純粋な皇帝の道具ではなかった。だが、彼女がいなくなったら誰がここに残るのだ？奴か？彼女か？」{n}ヒエロニムスはは、ヴラダイムを、そしてリザを指さした。最終的に、あなたを指さし、言った。{/n}「それとも、お前か？お前が法と信仰を守るのか？」
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Hieronymus cries out in woe and looks around the room with ferocious eyes.{/n} "Incendia may not have been the holiest and purest of the Emperor's tools, but who will be left here when she is gone? Him? Her?" {n}Hieronymus points his finger at Vladaym, then Ryzza, and finally, you.{/n} "You? Are you going to protect the law and the faith?"

traits.locale_text: 「駄目だ！」{n}ヒエロニムスは哀れに泣き叫び、獰猛な目で部屋を見回した。{/n}「インセンディアは決して、神聖で純粋な皇帝の道具ではなかった。だが、彼女がいなくなったら誰がここに残るのだ？奴か？彼女か？」{n}ヒエロニムスはは、ヴラダイムを、そしてリザを指さした。最終的に、あなたを指さし、言った。{/n}「それとも、お前か？お前が法と信仰を守るのか？」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «¡No!». {n}Hieronymus grita afligido y mira alrededor de la sala con ojos llenos de crueldad.{/n} «Puede que Incendia no haya sido la herramientas del Emperador más santa y más pura, pero ¿quién quedará cuando ella no esté? ¿Él? ¿Ella?». {n}Hieronymus señala a Vladaym, luego a Ryzza y luego a ti.{/n} «¿Usted? ¿Va a proteger la ley y la fe?».
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Hieronymus cries out in woe and looks around the room with ferocious eyes.{/n} "Incendia may not have been the holiest and purest of the Emperor's tools, but who will be left here when she is gone? Him? Her?" {n}Hieronymus points his finger at Vladaym, then Ryzza, and finally, you.{/n} "You? Are you going to protect the law and the faith?"

traits.locale_text: «¡No!». {n}Hieronymus grita afligido y mira alrededor de la sala con ojos llenos de crueldad.{/n} «Puede que Incendia no haya sido la herramientas del Emperador más santa y más pura, pero ¿quién quedará cuando ella no esté? ¿Él? ¿Ella?». {n}Hieronymus señala a Vladaym, luego a Ryzza y luego a ti.{/n} «¿Usted? ¿Va a proteger la ley y la fe?».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Nein!" {n}Hieronymus schreit das Wort mit gequälter Stimme und sieht sich mit wildem Blick im Raum um.{/n} "Incendia mag nicht das heiligste und reinste Werkzeug des Imperators gewesen sein, doch wer ist hier noch übrig, wenn sie fort ist? Er? Sie?" {n}Hieronymus deutet mit dem Finger auf Vladaym, dann auf Ryzza, schließlich auf dich.{/n} "Ihr? Werdet Ihr das Gesetz und den Glauben beschützen?"
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Hieronymus cries out in woe and looks around the room with ferocious eyes.{/n} "Incendia may not have been the holiest and purest of the Emperor's tools, but who will be left here when she is gone? Him? Her?" {n}Hieronymus points his finger at Vladaym, then Ryzza, and finally, you.{/n} "You? Are you going to protect the law and the faith?"

traits.locale_text: "Nein!" {n}Hieronymus schreit das Wort mit gequälter Stimme und sieht sich mit wildem Blick in der Halle um.{/n} "Incendia mag nicht das heiligste und reinste Werkzeug des Imperators gewesen sein, doch wer ist hier noch übrig, wenn sie fort ist? Er? Sie?" {n}Hieronymus deutet mit dem Finger auf Vladaym, dann auf Ryzza, schließlich auf dich.{/n} "Ihr? Werdet Ihr das Gesetz und den Glauben beschützen?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Non ! {n}crie Hiéronymus de désespoir en balayant la salle d'un regard féroce.{/n} Incendia n'a peut-être pas été la servante la plus pure et la plus parfaite de l'Empereur, mais qui restera-t-il ici quand elle ne sera plus là ? Lui ? Elle ? {n}demande-t-il en pointant du doigt Vladaym puis Ryzza et enfin, vous.{/n} Vous ? Comptez-vous protéger la loi et la foi ? »
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Hieronymus cries out in woe and looks around the room with ferocious eyes.{/n} "Incendia may not have been the holiest and purest of the Emperor's tools, but who will be left here when she is gone? Him? Her?" {n}Hieronymus points his finger at Vladaym, then Ryzza, and finally, you.{/n} "You? Are you going to protect the law and the faith?"

traits.locale_text: « Non ! {n}crie Hiéronymus de désespoir en balayant la salle d'un regard féroce.{/n} Incendia n'a peut-être pas été la servante la plus pure et la plus parfaite de l'Empereur, mais qui restera-t-il ici quand elle ne sera plus là ? Lui ? Elle ? {n}demande-t-il en pointant du doigt Vladaym puis Ryzza et enfin, vous.{/n} Vous ? Comptez-vous protéger la loi et la foi ? »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Hayır!" {n}Kederle çığıran Hieronymus, vahşi gözlerini odada dolaştırıyor.{/n} "İncendia, İmparator'un elindeki en kutsal veya en saf gereç olmayabilir ancak o gittikten sonra burada kim kalacak? Bu mu? O mu?" {n}Hieronymus; parmağıyla önce Vladaym'ı, ardından Ryzza'yı, son olarak da seni gösteriyor.{/n} "Yoksa sen mi? Kanunu ve inancı sen mi koruyacaksın?"
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Hieronymus cries out in woe and looks around the room with ferocious eyes.{/n} "Incendia may not have been the holiest and purest of the Emperor's tools, but who will be left here when she is gone? Him? Her?" {n}Hieronymus points his finger at Vladaym, then Ryzza, and finally, you.{/n} "You? Are you going to protect the law and the faith?"

traits.locale_text: "Hayır!" {n}Hieronymus kederle çığırıyor ve vahşi gözlerle odaya bakıyor.{/n} "İncendia, İmparator'un elindeki en kutsal veya en saf gereç olmayabilir ancak o gittikten sonra burada kim kalacak? O mu? O mu?" {n}Hieronymus parmağıyla önce Vladaym'ı, ardından Ryzza'yı, son olarak da seni gösteriyor.{/n} "Sen mi? Kanunu ve inancı sen mi koruyacaksın?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
